mapper.select: SELECT t_comment.board_id, t_comment.comment_content, t_comment.register_user_id, DATE_FORMAT(t_comment.register_date,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') as register_date FROM t_comment WHERE t_comment.board_id = #{boardId} AND t_comment.delete_flag != 1 ORDER BY t_comment.register_date asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_comment ( board_id, comment_content, register_user_id, register_date, delete_flag ) VALUE ( #{commentDto.boardId}, #{commentDto.commentContent}, #{commentDto.commentRegisterUserId}, NOW(), '0' );
